title: New Orleans Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 (500g) loaf French bread', '60g chopped pecans', '110g unsalted butter, melted', '3 eggs', '250g single cream', '300ml milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '200g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '75g sultanas']
